member.name: T:WavInputAdapter.WavInputAdapter

member.name: P:WavInputAdapter.WavInputAdapter.WavFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file from which to read measurements.

member.name: P:WavInputAdapter.WavInputAdapter.RecoveryDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in seconds, needed to recover from a back log.

member.name: P:WavInputAdapter.WavInputAdapter.MemoryCache
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if WAV file should be cached in memory.
member.remarks: Useful for situations where disk I/O can be a bottleneck.

member.name: P:WavInputAdapter.WavInputAdapter.OutputMeasurements
member.summary: Gets or sets the output measurements.
member.remarks: The output measurements are like templates. New measurements generated by this adapter will be copies of these output measurements, in which only the values and timestamps will differ.

member.name: P:WavInputAdapter.WavInputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if the data input connects asynchronously.
member.remarks: This returns false because this adapter does not connect asynchronously.

member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.
